action.name: Execute
action.command: sh -c "if [[ `wmctrl -l | awk '/quake/ {print $1}'` ]]; then xdotool set_desktop_for_window $(wmctrl -l | awk '/quake/ {print $1}' | head -1) $(wmctrl -d | grep '*' | cut -d ' ' -f1) windowactivate $(wmctrl -l | awk '/quake/ {print $1}' | head -1); else `termite -t quake --name="quake"`; fi"
